sectionText: Topic:  Sexuality and Society  Examines the changing meanings of sexual desires, practices, identities, and institutions. Draws on U.S. and transnational contexts to explore topics including sociological theories of sex and sexuality, gender and sexualities, sexuality and popular culture, the body, heterosexuality, LGBTQ issues, sexual subcultures, sexuality and the state, sexual citizenship, globalization and sexuality, sexual politics, and sex work.
